task.title: Primary name
task.shortdesc: Main title of a record-level entity.

row.entry: Do not repeat on nestedmembers_exemplified_by → HumanMadeObject.

context.note: The primary name is mirrored in parallel non-Latin script titles, when present.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: PrimaryName sampleBibs: - 3 - 9447 fieldSpec: - 2456abfghknps - 8806abfghknps trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: BOTH

step.cmd: Process the main title values (MARC245and parallel880, if applicable).

substep.cmd: Join the string value of MARC245subfieldsabfghknps(excluding$6) with a whitespace character.
If applicable, join the string value of parallel MARC880subfieldsabfghknps(excluding$6) with a whitespace character.
